verbs.description: Nearly 1,500 boys [V: are] being held in a former Walmart in Texas , a detention center that greets the migrant children with a big Trump mural .
Nearly 1,500 boys are [V: being] held in a former Walmart in Texas , a detention center that greets the migrant children with a big Trump mural .
[ARG1: Nearly 1,500 boys] are being [V: held] [ARGM-LOC: in a former Walmart in Texas , a detention center that greets the migrant children with a big Trump mural] .
Nearly 1,500 boys are being held in a former Walmart in Texas , [ARG0: a detention center] [R-ARG0: that] [V: greets] [ARG1: the migrant children] [ARGM-MNR: with a big Trump mural] .
